name: Unified
uniques: Only available <for [Human player] Civilizations> <hidden from users>
May heal outside of friendly territory
Heals [100] damage if it kills a unit
Unit will heal every turn, even if it performs an action
No damage penalty for wounded units
[+100]% Strength <when fighting in [Open terrain] tiles> <when attacking>
[+100]% Strength <when fighting in [Rough terrain] tiles> <when attacking>
